doc.name: checkmark

syntax.example: set the checkmark of menuItem to {true | false}

doc.summary: Has no effect and is included in LiveCode for compatibility with imported HyperCard stacks.

description.p: In HyperCard, the checkmark property determines whether a menu item has a checkmark next to it.
A handler can set the checkmark to any value without causing a script error, but the actual checkmark is not changed.
